title: My Staking
subtitle: Safe, high-yield mining machine staking service
connectWalletToViewHistory: Please connect your wallet to view your staking history
stakingNote1: During the staking period, your funds will be used to purchase and operate mining machines to obtain mining returns
stakingNote2: Staking returns may fluctuate depending on mining machine operation and market conditions
stakingNote3: Early termination of staking may incur certain fees
stakingNote4: Please ensure you understand the staking risks before proceeding
